name: Flow ERC1155
desc: A flow contract that is also an ERC1155 token that can be minted by expressions. Transfers can be restricted by an expression.

inputs.name: URI
inputs.desc: The URI for the ERC1155 token that is minted.

expressions.name: Handle transfer
expressions.desc: Review and restrict transfers of the flow contract's own ERC1155 token. Mint and burns must be controlled by the flow expressions instead.

cells.name: Transfer caller
cells.desc: The contract or wallet that called transfer.

cells.name: Flow contract
cells.desc: The address of the FlowERC1155 contract.

cells.name: Transfer operator
cells.desc: The address of the transfer operator.

cells.name: Transfer from address
cells.desc: The address the token is being transferred from.

cells.name: Transfer to address
cells.desc: The address the token is being transferred to.

contextColumns.name: Token IDs
contextColumns.desc: All the ERC1155 ids being transferred.

contextColumns.name: Token amounts
contextColumns.desc: All the ERC1155 amounts being transferred, pairwise with the IDs.

expressions.name: Flows
expressions.desc: The available flows for this token.

cells.name: Flow caller
cells.desc: The contract or wallet that called flow.

cells.name: Flow contract
cells.desc: The address of the FlowERC1155 contract.
